long_description: Offering plenty of warmth and versatility for everyday winter wear, the women's REI Therum down vest features water-repellent down. Water-repellent 650-fill-power duck down offers all-conditions warmth. Shell is windproof up to 55 mph and features a durable water repellent (DWR) finish. Has 2 zip handwarmer pockets; inner pocket has a cord port. The women's REI Therum down vest has a hem drawcord; front zipper has a chinguard and a stormflap.
short_description: Offering plenty of warmth and versatility for everyday winter wear, the women's REI Therum down vest features water-repellent down.
